changeSet.sql: insert into os_consent_statements (identifier, code, statement, activity_status) select OS_CONSENT_STMTS_SEQ.nextVal, concat('C', row_number() over (partition by t0.activity_status order by t0.identifier)), t0.statement, 'Active' from ( select distinct statement, identifier, activity_status from catissue_consent_tier where activity_status = 'Active' ) t0

changeSet.author: mdnasim
changeSet.id: migrate consent statement into consent statement table
changeSet.sql:
set @row := 0;
insert into os_consent_statements (code, statement, activity_status) select concat('C', @row := @row + 1), t0.statement, 'Active' from ( select distinct statement from catissue_consent_tier where activity_status = 'Active' ) t0

changeSet.author: mdnasim
changeSet.id: update consent statement identifier of consent tier
changeSet.sql: update catissue_consent_tier tier set consent_stmt_id = ( select identifier from os_consent_statements stmt where stmt.statement = tier.statement ) where activity_status = 'Active'

changeSet.sql: create or replace view consent_tier_view as ( select cnsstmt.IDENTIFIER AS IDENTIFIER, cnsrsp.COLL_PROT_REG_ID AS CPR_ID, stmt.STATEMENT AS STATEMENT, cnsrsp.RESPONSE AS RESPONSE from catissue_consent_tier cnsstmt join catissue_consent_tier_response cnsrsp on cnsstmt.IDENTIFIER = cnsrsp.CONSENT_TIER_ID join os_consent_statements stmt on stmt.IDENTIFIER = cnsstmt.CONSENT_STMT_ID where cnsrsp.COLL_PROT_REG_ID is not null )
